name: Blademail
desc: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

name: Blink Dagger
desc: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

name: Shadow Amulet
desc: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

name: Power Threads
desc: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

name: Mask Of Madness
desc: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

name: Aghanim's Scepter
desc: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: Scythe Of Vyse
desc: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

name: Orchid Malevolence
desc: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

name: Assault Cuirass
desc: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

name: Heart Of Tarrasque
desc: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

name: Divine Rapier
desc: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

name: Daedalus
desc: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
